title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI copilot that uses Ollama models to suggest shell commands and code snippets.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper around Ollama’s REST API for native Nim applications.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local AI summarization and Q&A to your notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for reproducible CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings
summary: Rust micro-service exposing Ollama embeddings via gRPC for high-throughput systems.

title: ollama-rf
summary: Robot Framework library for testing and automating interactions with Ollama models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama demonstrating async HTTP with no external dependencies.
